snippet: The state of Alaska announced Monday it will sue the federal government to open a road through a national wildlife refuge so that residents of a village will have improved access for emergency flights at an all-weather airport....

headline.print_headline: Alaska to Sue for Road Through Wildlife Refuge
headline.main: Alaska to Sue for Road Through Wildlife Refuge

lead_paragraph: The state of Alaska announced Monday it will sue the federal government to open a road through a national wildlife refuge so that residents of a village will have improved access for emergency flights at an all-weather airport.
